title: Green dragon scale mail
data:
**[English]()** • [中文（中国大陆）‎](/wiki/Green_dragon_scale_mail/zh-CN "Green dragon scale mail/zh-CN")

| \[   green dragon scale mail   [![Green dragon scale mail.png](/images/5/5e/Green_dragon_scale_mail.png)](/wiki/File:Green_dragon_scale_mail.png) |                                                                    |
| ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------ |
| Appearance                                                                                                                                        | green dragon scale mail                                            |
|                                                                                                                                                   |                                                                    |
| Slot                                                                                                                                              | [body armor](/wiki/Body_armor "Body armor")                        |
| AC                                                                                                                                                | [9](/wiki/Armor_class "Armor class")                               |
| Special                                                                                                                                           | - [poison resistance](/wiki/Poison_resistance "Poison resistance") |
|                                                                                                                                                   |                                                                    |
| Base price                                                                                                                                        | 900 [zm](/wiki/Zorkmid "Zorkmid")                                  |
| Weight                                                                                                                                            | [40](/wiki/Weight "Weight")                                        |
| Material                                                                                                                                          | [dragon hide](/wiki/Dragon_hide "Dragon hide")                     |

- *For the dragon mail most commonly abbreviated as GDSM, see [gray dragon scale mail](/wiki/Gray_dragon_scale_mail "Gray dragon scale mail").*

**Green dragon scale mail** is a type of [body armor](/wiki/Body_armor "Body armor") that appears in *[NetHack](/wiki/NetHack "NetHack")*. It is made of [dragon hide](/wiki/Dragon_hide "Dragon hide") like all [dragon scale mail](/wiki/Dragon_scale_mail "Dragon scale mail").

[ ]

## Contents

- [1 Generation](#Generation)

- [2 Description](#Description)

- [3 Strategy](#Strategy)

- [4 History](#History)

- [5 Variants](#Variants)

  - [5.1 SporkHack](#SporkHack)
  - [5.2 UnNetHack](#UnNetHack)
  - [5.3 dNetHack](#dNetHack)
  - [5.4 FIQHack](#FIQHack)

- [6 References](#References)

## Generation

Green dragon scale mail is not randomly generated. Reading a non-cursed [scroll of enchant armor](/wiki/Scroll_of_enchant_armor "Scroll of enchant armor") that targets worn [green dragon scales](/wiki/Green_dragon_scales "Green dragon scales") will convert them into mail, with a blessed scroll adding a point of [enchantment](/wiki/Enchantment "Enchantment").

[Player monsters](/wiki/Player_monster "Player monster") that are not [monks](/wiki/Monk_\(player_monster\) "Monk (player monster)") generated on the [Astral Plane](/wiki/Astral_Plane "Astral Plane") have a 1⁄9 chance of [generating with](/wiki/Monster_starting_inventory "Monster starting inventory") green dragon scale mail as their initial body armor before role-specific replacements.[\[1\]](#cite_note-1)

## Description

While worn, green dragon scale mail confers 9 base AC and [poison resistance](/wiki/Poison_resistance "Poison resistance"). Uncontrolled [polymorph](/wiki/Polymorph "Polymorph") while wearing green dragon scale mail will revert them to scales and turn the wearer into a [green dragon](/wiki/Green_dragon "Green dragon").[\[2\]](#cite_note-2)[\[3\]](#cite_note-3)

*The following information pertains to an upcoming version ([NetHack 3.7.0](/wiki/NetHack_3.7.0 "NetHack 3.7.0")). If this version is now released, please verify that it is still accurate, then update the page to incorporate this information.*

Per [commit ef1eeed7](https://github.com/NetHack/NetHack/commit/ef1eeed7550e38fa1e4ff0ef608f3c8b55eaa950), both the scales and scale mail also provide [sickness resistance](/wiki/Sickness_resistance "Sickness resistance").

## Strategy

- *Main article: [Dragon scale mail](/wiki/Dragon_scale_mail "Dragon scale mail")*

Green dragon scale mail may seem enticing for an early [wish](/wiki/Wish "Wish") at first glance, due to the prevalence of early-game deaths (particularly [instadeath](/wiki/Instadeath "Instadeath")) at the hands of [poison](/wiki/Poison "Poison") - however, there are many sources of poison resistance, including gaining [experience levels](/wiki/Experience_level "Experience level") for certain characters, and this assumes they are not a race or role that starts with the resistance outright. Obtaining any poison resistance source, particularly the intrinsic, removes poison as a threat for the rest of the game and leaves green dragon mail with little use.

However, for some [conduct](/wiki/Conduct "Conduct") players (in particular [foodless](/wiki/Foodless "Foodless") [atheists](/wiki/Atheist "Atheist")) it may still be a better option than [gray dragon scale mail](/wiki/Gray_dragon_scale_mail "Gray dragon scale mail") or [silver dragon scale mail](/wiki/Silver_dragon_scale_mail "Silver dragon scale mail"): extrinsic poison resistance is a higher priority for characters that cannot eat to gain the intrinsic, and [magic resistance](/wiki/Magic_resistance "Magic resistance") and [reflection](/wiki/Reflection "Reflection") sources are all extrinsic as well. Like all other types of dragon mail, green dragon mail can be sufficient for a character in dire need of an AC boost that is unable to obtain scales more conveniently.

*The following information pertains to an upcoming version ([NetHack 3.7.0](/wiki/NetHack_3.7.0 "NetHack 3.7.0")). If this version is now released, please verify that it is still accurate, then update the page to incorporate this information.*

Per [commit d0b11fd2](https://github.com/NetHack/NetHack/commit/d0b11fd2c05dae5ebc7a3ff6425257e6ed372894), poison will no longer cause instadeath, but can still cause significant HP damage as well as attribute loss.

Green dragon scale mail is more likely to be considered for characters and pets due to its sickness resistance: Monsters can be affected by [illness](/wiki/Illness "Illness")-inducing attacks, and while sickness-inducing threats are rare, this small handful of monsters includes [Demogorgon](/wiki/Demogorgon "Demogorgon") - characters out to prove themselves against him specifically may give consideration to green dragon scale mail as part of their "anti-Demogorgon" kit.

## History

Green dragon scale mail first appears with most other colors of dragon scale mail in [NetHack 3.0.0](/wiki/NetHack_3.0.0 "NetHack 3.0.0"). From NetHack 3.0.0 to [NetHack 3.0.10](/wiki/NetHack_3.0.10 "NetHack 3.0.10"), including variants based on those versions, green dragon scale mail is created by polymorphing the corpse of a green dragon. Green dragon scales are introduced in [NetHack 3.1.0](/wiki/NetHack_3.1.0 "NetHack 3.1.0"), along with the current method for converting them into dragon scale mail.

## Variants

- *Main article: [Dragon-scaled armor](/wiki/Dragon-scaled_armor "Dragon-scaled armor")*

In some variants, dragon scale mail is phased out in favor of dragon-scaled armor, whose implementation is based on a proposal by dtsund. Instead of being made into mail of its own, dragon scales are treated as a [cloak](/wiki/Cloak "Cloak"), and reading a scroll of enchant armor melds them onto a worn set of body armor, generally augmenting that armor by adding its AC and conferred extrinsic properties to it. Dragon-scaled armor is implemented in [NetHack Fourk](/wiki/NetHack_Fourk "NetHack Fourk"), [xNetHack](/wiki/XNetHack "XNetHack"), [EvilHack](/wiki/EvilHack "EvilHack"), and [Hack'EM](/wiki/Hack%27EM "Hack'EM").

Several variants also give green dragon scale mail additional properties while worn, and may even introduce other forms of green dragon scale armor. Variants that implement partial intrinsics and/or [object properties](/wiki/Object_properties "Object properties") may also make green dragon mail and other colors more worthwhile.

### SporkHack

In [SporkHack](/wiki/SporkHack "SporkHack"), worn green dragon scale mail can [passively](/wiki/Passive "Passive") poison attackers for d6 damage with a 1⁄20 chance of instadeath, unless the attacker has poison resistance.

### UnNetHack

In [UnNetHack](/wiki/UnNetHack "UnNetHack"), dragon scales and dragon scale mail have randomized powers and [appearances](/wiki/Randomized_appearance "Randomized appearance") in each game - to [wish](/wiki/Wish "Wish") for dragon armor or scales by its corresponding power, either type of armor must be formally identified first, e.g. by using a [scroll of identify](/wiki/Scroll_of_identify "Scroll of identify") on dropped dragon scales (which identifies the matching scale mail along with it) or by witnessing the dragon use its breath weapon. Only wishes from a [wand of wishing](/wiki/Wand_of_wishing "Wand of wishing") can create dragon scale mail directly.

Green dragon scale mail is effectively replaced by **poison dragon scale mail**, which confers only 5 base AC like all dragon scale mail in UnNetHack.

### dNetHack

- *Main article: [Dragon armor (dNetHack)](/wiki/Dragon_armor_\(dNetHack\) "Dragon armor (dNetHack)")*

In [dNetHack](/wiki/DNetHack "DNetHack") and [notdNetHack](/wiki/NotdNetHack "NotdNetHack"), worn green dragon scale mail additionally confers sickness resistance.

### FIQHack

In [FIQHack](/wiki/FIQHack "FIQHack"), worn green dragon scale mail additionally confers sickness resistance. It also weighs 300 aum like all dragon scale mail in FIQHack (which is halved while worn).

## References

1. [↑](#cite_ref-1) [src/mplayer.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 156](https://github.com/NetHack/NetHack/blob/NetHack-3.6.7_Released/src/mplayer.c#L156): *initial body armor for Astral playermons is random DSM, with equal probability*
2. [↑](#cite_ref-2) [src/polyself.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 501](https://github.com/NetHack/NetHack/blob/NetHack-3.6.7_Released/src/polyself.c#L501)
3. [↑](#cite_ref-3) [src/polyself.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 518](https://github.com/NetHack/NetHack/blob/NetHack-3.6.7_Released/src/polyself.c#L518)

[![This article has been updated to reflect NetHack 3.6.7. Click here for more information.](/images/f/f7/Nh367-icon.png)](/wiki/NetHackWiki:Next_version "This article has been updated to reflect NetHack 3.6.7. Click here for more information.")
html:
Green dragon scale mail

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search
English

 • 中文（中国大陆）‎
[   green dragon scale mail  
Appearance green dragon scale mail
Slot body armor
AC 9
Special
  • poison resistance
Base price 900 zm
Weight 40
Material dragon hide
For the dragon mail most commonly abbreviated as GDSM, see gray dragon scale mail.

Green dragon scale mail is a type of body armor that appears in NetHack. It is made of dragon hide like all dragon scale mail.

Contents

  • 1 Generation
  • 2 Description
  • 3 Strategy
  • 4 History
  • 5 Variants
    • 5.1 SporkHack
    • 5.2 UnNetHack
    • 5.3 dNetHack
    • 5.4 FIQHack
  • 6 References

Generation

Green dragon scale mail is not randomly generated. Reading a non-cursed scroll of enchant armor that targets worn green dragon scales will convert them into mail, with a blessed scroll adding a point of enchantment.

Player monsters that are not monks generated on the Astral Plane have a 1⁄9 chance of generating with green dragon scale mail as their initial body armor before role-specific replacements.[1]

Description

While worn, green dragon scale mail confers 9 base AC and poison resistance. Uncontrolled polymorph while wearing green dragon scale mail will revert them to scales and turn the wearer into a green dragon.[2][3]

The following information pertains to an upcoming version (NetHack 3.7.0). If this version is now released, please verify that it is still accurate, then update the page to incorporate this information.

Per commit ef1eeed7, both the scales and scale mail also provide sickness resistance.

Strategy

Main article: Dragon scale mail

Green dragon scale mail may seem enticing for an early wish at first glance, due to the prevalence of early-game deaths (particularly instadeath) at the hands of poison - however, there are many sources of poison resistance, including gaining experience levels for certain characters, and this assumes they are not a race or role that starts with the resistance outright. Obtaining any poison resistance source, particularly the intrinsic, removes poison as a threat for the rest of the game and leaves green dragon mail with little use.

However, for some conduct players (in particular foodless atheists) it may still be a better option than gray dragon scale mail or silver dragon scale mail: extrinsic poison resistance is a higher priority for characters that cannot eat to gain the intrinsic, and magic resistance and reflection sources are all extrinsic as well. Like all other types of dragon mail, green dragon mail can be sufficient for a character in dire need of an AC boost that is unable to obtain scales more conveniently.

The following information pertains to an upcoming version (NetHack 3.7.0). If this version is now released, please verify that it is still accurate, then update the page to incorporate this information.

Per commit d0b11fd2, poison will no longer cause instadeath, but can still cause significant HP damage as well as attribute loss.

Green dragon scale mail is more likely to be considered for characters and pets due to its sickness resistance: Monsters can be affected by illness-inducing attacks, and while sickness-inducing threats are rare, this small handful of monsters includes Demogorgon - characters out to prove themselves against him specifically may give consideration to green dragon scale mail as part of their "anti-Demogorgon" kit.

History

Green dragon scale mail first appears with most other colors of dragon scale mail in NetHack 3.0.0. From NetHack 3.0.0 to NetHack 3.0.10, including variants based on those versions, green dragon scale mail is created by polymorphing the corpse of a green dragon. Green dragon scales are introduced in NetHack 3.1.0, along with the current method for converting them into dragon scale mail.

Variants

Main article: Dragon-scaled armor

In some variants, dragon scale mail is phased out in favor of dragon-scaled armor, whose implementation is based on a proposal by dtsund. Instead of being made into mail of its own, dragon scales are treated as a cloak, and reading a scroll of enchant armor melds them onto a worn set of body armor, generally augmenting that armor by adding its AC and conferred extrinsic properties to it. Dragon-scaled armor is implemented in NetHack Fourk, xNetHack, EvilHack, and Hack'EM.

Several variants also give green dragon scale mail additional properties while worn, and may even introduce other forms of green dragon scale armor. Variants that implement partial intrinsics and/or object properties may also make green dragon mail and other colors more worthwhile.

SporkHack

In SporkHack, worn green dragon scale mail can passively poison attackers for d6 damage with a 1⁄20 chance of instadeath, unless the attacker has poison resistance.

UnNetHack

In UnNetHack, dragon scales and dragon scale mail have randomized powers and appearances in each game - to wish for dragon armor or scales by its corresponding power, either type of armor must be formally identified first, e.g. by using a scroll of identify on dropped dragon scales (which identifies the matching scale mail along with it) or by witnessing the dragon use its breath weapon. Only wishes from a wand of wishing can create dragon scale mail directly.

Green dragon scale mail is effectively replaced by poison dragon scale mail, which confers only 5 base AC like all dragon scale mail in UnNetHack.

dNetHack

Main article: Dragon armor (dNetHack)

In dNetHack and notdNetHack, worn green dragon scale mail additionally confers sickness resistance.

FIQHack

In FIQHack, worn green dragon scale mail additionally confers sickness resistance. It also weighs 300 aum like all dragon scale mail in FIQHack (which is halved while worn).

References

  1. ↑ src/mplayer.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 156: initial body armor for Astral playermons is random DSM, with equal probability
  2. ↑ src/polyself.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 501
  3. ↑ src/polyself.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 518

Obtaining any poison resistance source, particularly the intrinsic, removes poison as a threat for the rest of the game and leaves green dragon mail with little use. Like all other types of dragon mail, green dragon mail can be sufficient for a character in dire need of an AC boost that is unable to obtain scales more conveniently. {{upcoming|NetHack 3.7.0|Per {{commit|d0b11fd2c05dae5ebc7a3ff6425257e6ed372894}}, poison will no longer cause instadeath, but can still cause significant HP damage as well as attribute loss. From NetHack 3.0.0 to [[NetHack 3.0.10]], including variants based on those versions, green dragon scale mail is created by polymorphing the corpse of a green dragon. Green dragon scales are introduced in [[NetHack 3.1.0]], along with the current method for converting them into dragon scale mail. ==Variants== {{main|Dragon-scaled armor}} In some variants, dragon scale mail is phased out in favor of dragon-scaled armor, whose implementation is based on a proposal by dtsund. Instead of being made into mail of its own, dragon scales are treated as a [[cloak]], and reading a scroll of enchant armor melds them onto a worn set of body armor, generally augmenting that armor by adding its AC and conferred extrinsic properties to it. Dragon-scaled armor is implemented in [[NetHack Fourk]], [[xNetHack]], [[EvilHack]], and [[Hack'EM]]. Several variants also give green dragon scale mail additional properties while worn, and may even introduce other forms of green dragon scale armor. Variants that implement partial intrinsics and/or [[object properties]] may also make green dragon mail and other colors more worthwhile. ===SporkHack=== In [[SporkHack]], worn green dragon scale mail can [[passive]]ly poison attackers for d6 damage with a {{frac|20}} chance of instadeath, unless the attacker has poison resistance. ===UnNetHack=== In [[UnNetHack]], dragon scales and dragon scale mail have randomized powers and [[Randomized appearance|appearances]] in each game - to [[wish]] for dragon armor or scales by its corresponding power, either type of armor must be formally identified first, e.g. by using a [[scroll of identify]] on dropped dragon scales (which identifies the matching scale mail along with it) or by witnessing the dragon use its breath weapon. Only wishes from a [[wand of wishing]] can create dragon scale mail directly. Green dragon scale mail is effectively replaced by '''poison dragon scale mail''', which confers only 5 base AC like all dragon scale mail in UnNetHack. ===dNetHack=== {{main|Dragon armor (dNetHack)}} In [[dNetHack]] and [[notdNetHack]], worn green dragon scale mail additionally confers sickness resistance. ===FIQHack=== In [[FIQHack]], worn green dragon scale mail additionally confers sickness resistance. It also weighs 300 aum like all dragon scale mail in FIQHack (which is halved while worn). ==References== {{nethack-367}} [[Category:Dragon armor]]
